snippet: Initiatives are under way to reduce noise in hospitals, and while it's too early to tell whether they will prove successful, it has become clear that patient complaints about noise and lack of sleep are critical to quality of care.
abstract: Initiatives are under way to reduce noise in hospitals, and while it's too early to tell whether they will prove successful, it has become clear that patient complaints about noise and lack of sleep are critical to quality of care.

headline.main: The Clatter of the Hospital Room
headline.print_headline: Doctor And Patient: The Quest for Quiet in the Hospital Room
